reviews.text:
Sorry, but 4 stars for this place is completely unjustified!

This is the former “Antares Hotel Accademia,” with only minor fixes. We booked the “Superior Double” based on glowing reviews, expecting a fantastic stay. Instead, it was a huge letdown. We don’t usually complain, but this room was ridiculously small. You walk in and immediately hit your legs on the bed—no exaggeration.

We were there with my 4-year-old niece and had a flight at 5 in the morning. When we checked out to go to our car, we were appalled to see prostitutes right in front of the hotel door, soliciting cars. Apparently, this is their regular spot.

The restaurant was good, even though we were the only two people there. The risotto was excellent.

It’s a nice hotel 20 min walk from Milan Convention center. Nice service, always helpful. Had umbrellas for rainy days. Good connection to the center but a bit far, takes 1 hour to get to the center with public transport. Breakfast was ok, didn’t change in 3 days. I didn’t like the hair fan - very heavy and hard to use. Gym was small but nice, many good programs. It was pretty hot in the gym though, no air. 1 hour to the Bergamo airport, depends on thebtraffic - it was faster to get out from the city (apprx 40 min) than to it (1.5 hrs).

This was a great 5 nights stay
Everyone was absolutely helpful and rooms are clean well equipped and quiet
Breakfast has many options available including lactose free yogurt, all sorts of sweets / pastries and warm scrambled eggs and more
Luisa prepares delicious cappuccinos for you every morning or your tea. Or coffe choice
At night we had dinner every day at the restaurant with gourmet dishes
Delicious every single option
Francesco the waiter was very kind and always at our service
Staff at reception also helpful a and kind
Thank you so much

We stayed here for three nights a year ago.

Very nice hotel, newly renovated and perfectly clean. Breakfast was very good too.

We struggled with opening the window ourselves but the staff was super patient and came to help us multiple times.

Although it’s not right in the city center, it’s very well connected by public transport, and we would be able to reach our destinations in about 15 - 30 minutes door to door. We will stay here again.
Very nice hotel! Freshly refurbished hotel and the staff is really friendly, professional and helpful. The interiors are very well curated and nicely kept.
